An extension to save scroll position of a webpage

You must have ran in to a situation that you are reading a long article or document but you don't have sufficient time to finish it , so you close the tab, and the next time when you open the article or the document again, you have no idea where you left it. But with this extension your problem is solved . This extension saves the scroll position of the page and when you click the "fetch scroll" button the page scrolls to the saved position âœ”.
